name: N.U.L.L.
description:
N.U.L.L

In this game you have to program, program and program again! An in-game programming language has been specially created for this game, you can see an example of the code below:The game is unique in that the code you write is executed every frame, which allows you to get the experience of real programming of the character's behavior, just like in a game engine.

Each level is a small room for which you need to write an algorithm to pass, while spending as little memory as possible (memory is limited at each level).All levels have MILLIONS of solutions and each is unique in its own way! You can play even if you don't know any programming language, the game has detailed explanations about how the language works.This game can be used as an initial stage in learning programming, so here you will not only enjoy solving puzzles, but also learn something new!

P.S. Everything related to copyright can be found in CodeGame\CodeGame_Data\StreamingAssets\Copyright
